description: React component implementing a Jira project management panel with authentication, data fetching, and UI rendering.

methods.name: JiraPanel
methods.description: Main React component for Jira project panel, handles authentication state, data fetching, and UI rendering.

methods.name: handleAuthSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful authentication, triggers login and project fetch.

methods.name: handleAuthError
methods.description: Handles authentication errors, logs errors to console.

methods.name: handleDisconnect
methods.description: Logs out the user from Jira.
